title: EYL #128 Grant Cardone on the Rich Avoiding Taxes, Business & Real Estate
itunes:title: EYL #128 Grant Cardone on the Rich Avoiding Taxes, Business & Real Estate
description:
For episode 128, we sat down with a legend in the field of finance and making money. Grant Cardone is a best-selling author, founder of the world's largest financial conference, and star of the hit TV show Undercover Billionaire. He has many titles, but all of it stems from real estate. He has amassed a real estate portfolio of over $2 billion in multi-family and commercial properties. 


In EYL 128, he walked us through his investing journey, he shared his nontraditional real estate philosophy, and he gave insight on how he gets deals. He also explained tax strategies used by the wealthy, he went over his keys to marketing, discussed ways to scale businesses and more. #grantcardone #taxtips #realestate 


Host IG: https://instagram.com/earnyourleisure?igshid=1xxyi7wafxf7a


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/grantcardone?igshid=15hmipt5x73ke
